name: One Of These Nights
content: One of these crazy old nights
We're gonna find out pretty mama
And the wicked wind whispers and moans
Well I got a few of my own
Oh someone to be kind to
In between the dark and the light
Oh coming right behind you swear
One of these dreams one of
These lost and lonely dreams now
The daughter of the devil himself
In between the wrong and the right
Oh coming right behind you swear
In between the dark and the light
Get you baby one of these nights
I can feel it I can feel it
One of these crazy crazy crazy nights
